name: Unity Volleyball
description:
In a Unity Volleyball game, hitting your teammate is not allowed!

Player One(Left)

Move: A / D

Kick:F

Player Two(Right)

Move: J / L

Kick: H

Restart: R

Quit: Esc

Made for Prototype Studio Week 7

Instructor: Bennett Foddy 

Prompt: "Fun to Watch"

*currently it only supports 2 players*

*I might make a version which supports 1 - 4 players in the future*
